  9  /-!
 10  # Minimal polynomials
 11  
 12  This file defines the minimal polynomial of an element x of an A-algebra B,
 13  under the assumption that x is integral over A.
 14  
 15  After stating the defining property we specialize to the setting of field extensions
 16  and derive some well-known properties, amongst which the fact that minimal polynomials
 17  are irreducible, and uniquely determined by their defining property.
 18  
 19  -/
 20  
 21  universes u v w
 22  
 23  open_locale classical
 24  open polynomial set function
 25  
 26  variables {α : Type u} {β : Type v}
 27  
 28  section min_poly_def
 29  variables [comm_ring α] [comm_ring β] [algebra α β]

src             └───────┘     └───────┘     └─────┘
typ             └───────┘     └───────┘     └─────┘
doc                                         └─────┘

 31  /-- Let B be an A-algebra, and x an element of B that is integral over A.
 32  The minimal polynomial of x is a monic polynomial of smallest degree that has x as its root. -/
 33  noncomputable def minimal_polynomial {x : β} (hx : is_integral α x) : polynomial α :=
id                                             ┴        └─────────┘ ┴ ┴    └────────┘ ┴
src                                                     └─────────┘        └────────┘
typ                                            ┴        └─────────┘ ┴ ┴    └────────┘ ┴
doc                                                                        └────────┘
 34  well_founded.min polynomial.degree_lt_wf _ hx
id   └──────────────┘ └─────────────────────┘   └┘
src  └──────────────┘ └─────────────────────┘
typ  └──────────────┘ └─────────────────────┘   └┘
doc  └──────────────┘
 35  
 36  end min_poly_def

 52  /--The defining property of the minimal polynomial of an element x:
 53  it is the monic polynomial with smallest degree that has x as its root.-/
 54  lemma min {p : polynomial α} (pmonic : p.monic) (hp : polynomial.aeval α β x p = 0) :
id                  └────────┘ ┴            ┴└────┘        └──────────────┘ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴

typ                 └────────┘ ┴            ┴└────┘        └──────────────┘ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴
doc                 └────────┘               └────┘        └──────────────┘
 55    degree (minimal_polynomial hx) ≤ degree p :=
id     └────┘  └────────────────┘ └┘  ┴ └────┘ ┴
src    └────┘  └────────────────┘     ┴ └────┘
typ    └────┘  └────────────────┘ └┘  ┴ └────┘ ┴
doc    └────┘  └────────────────┘       └────┘
 56  le_of_not_lt $ well_founded.not_lt_min degree_lt_wf _ hx ⟨pmonic, hp⟩

 68  /--If an element x is a root of a nonzero polynomial p,
 69  then the degree of p is at least the degree of the minimal polynomial of x.-/
 70  lemma degree_le_of_ne_zero
 71    {p : polynomial α} (pnz : p ≠ 0) (hp : polynomial.aeval α β x p = 0) :
id          └────────┘ ┴         ┴ ┴          └──────────────┘ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴
src         └────────┘             ┴          └──────────────┘         ┴
typ         └────────┘ ┴         ┴ ┴          └──────────────┘ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴
doc         └────────┘                        └──────────────┘
 72    degree (minimal_polynomial hx) ≤ degree p :=
id     └────┘  └────────────────┘ └┘  ┴ └────┘ ┴
src    └────┘  └────────────────┘     ┴ └────┘
typ    └────┘  └────────────────┘ └┘  ┴ └────┘ ┴
doc    └────┘  └────────────────┘       └────┘
 73  calc degree (minimal_polynomial hx) ≤ degree (p * C (leading_coeff p)⁻¹) :
id        └────┘  └────────────────┘       └────┘      ┴  └───────────┘
src       └────┘  └────────────────┘       └────┘      ┴  └───────────┘
typ       └────┘  └────────────────┘       └────┘      ┴  └───────────┘
doc       └────┘  └────────────────┘       └────┘      ┴  └───────────┘
 74      min _ (monic_mul_leading_coeff_inv pnz) (by simp [hp])
id       └─┘    └─────────────────────────┘ └─┘            └┘
src      └─┘    └─────────────────────────┘          └────┘  ┴
typ      └─┘    └─────────────────────────┘ └─┘      └────┘└┘┴

txt                                                  └────┘  ┴
par                                                  └────┘  ┴
pid                                                      ┴┴  ┴
st                                                  └────────┘
 75    ... = degree p : degree_mul_leading_coeff_inv p pnz

 77  /--The minimal polynomial of an element x is uniquely characterized by its defining property:
 78  if there is another monic polynomial of minimal degree that has x as a root,
 79  then this polynomial is equal to the minimal polynomial of x.-/
 80  lemma unique {p : polynomial α} (pmonic : p.monic) (hp : polynomial.aeval α β x p = 0)
id                     └────────┘ ┴            ┴└────┘        └──────────────┘ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴

doc                    └────────┘               └────┘        └──────────────┘
 81    (pmin : ∀ q : polynomial α, q.monic → polynomial.aeval α β x q = 0 → degree p ≤ degree q) :
id                   └────────┘ ┴  ┴└────┘   └──────────────┘ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴     └────┘ ┴ ┴ └────┘ ┴
src                  └────────┘     └────┘   └──────────────┘         ┴     └────┘   ┴ └────┘
